settings.heading: We believe in creating jewelry that can last lifetimes.
settings.message: The pieces we design aren’t about what’s happening around you like trends and popular opinions - we create pieces that celebrate who you are.

Our brand concept is inspired by the circular notion of heirlooms and recycled materials. The transformation of gold from raw to fluid to forged makes up the pillars of the brand's organically formed messaging, the fluidity of personas in photography and intentional products.

settings.heading: Sustainability
settings.message: Understanding that taking care of the planet is no longer a trendy proposition — it’s a necessity that current and future consumers expect.

settings.heading: Footprint
settings.message:
Within our first year of business, we are working towards becoming Climate Neutral Certified. Thispositive accreditation means achieving a balance between emitting carbon and committing to carbonreducing programs and business decisions. Achieving carbon neutrality or climate neutrality can helpaccelerate the world along the path towards net-zero by 2050.

Achieving carbon neutrality means we have measured and offset our carbon footprint in full.
